> Does anyone know for sure how the AI was designed to act, or at 
least how you guys expect it to act? The Snowstorm team will sleep 
easier at night knowing that there are no AI bugs in Openglad (or at 
least be prepared if there _are_ bugs in there).

The biggest thing I can think about is inconsistency.  In my scenario 
#160 (Release of Sun Bai), I frequently walk right by enemy fire 
elementals without being attacked.  In other scenarios, I can't walk 
around opponents without being attacked.  

Also, stupidity occurs: one of my team members will frequently get 
stuck trying to go after an opponent when there is a wall between the 
two characters instead of going after the nearby opponent it can 
reach.
